subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Based on draft position, one might expect the Nets’ Terrence Williams to be an N.B.A. starter and the Knicks’ Landry Fields to be in the D-League, not the other way around.
snippet: Based on draft position, one might expect the Nets’ Terrence Williams to be an N.B.A. starter and the Knicks’ Landry Fields to be in the D-League, not the other way around.
